column4: Is SMB running when ubuntu (gnome) is first started after installing ?  I want to copy a file from a shared dir from an XP machine.
Or you can right click a folder and choose share :)
If you want stability go with Dapper
Otherwise I would go with Gutsy since you will have to go through it to upgrade to hardy anyway ( Dapper on the other hand will upgrade directly to hardy once it is out )
